TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的组合框。

span.span: Displays a combo box in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于显示组合框控件的专用类型 ，它是与列表选择字段组合的编辑字段。The class is a specialized type of used to display a combo box control, which is an editing field combined with a list selection field. 当前选定的 承载一个 ，用户可以在其中更改单元格的值，假设该单元格的 属性设置为 `false`。The currently selected hosts a in which the user can change the cell's value, assuming the cell's property is set to `false`. 与 控件不同， 没有 和 属性。Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反，从下拉列表中选择一个值会将单元格 属性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 是专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下， 初始化为新的 。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有 之后对列中的单元格进行样式设置，请将列的 属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是，更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元，并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 通常会使用 类型，除非要重写特定单元的列值。You will typically work with the type unless you want to override column values for specific cells. 用于填充下拉列表的 类概述主题中所述的准则适用于单元格和列实例。The guidelines described in the class overview topic for populating the drop-down list applies to both cell and column instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 类，该类使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the class, which makes use of the class. 你可以设置单元 、和 属性，其方式与在此示例中设置相应的列属性的方式相同。You can set the cell , , and properties in the same way that the corresponding column properties are set in this example. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

related.span: 如何：访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象

span.span: How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当从 派生并将新属性添加到派生类时，重写 方法。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreateAccessibilityInstance` 方法返回的 对象仅支持 [UI 自动化](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview)属性，该属性仅适用于从 .NET Framework 4.7.2 开始重新编译为 .NET Framework 目标版本的应用程序。The object returned by the `CreateAccessibilityInstance` method supports the [UI automation](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview) property only in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向 .NET Framework 早期版本但在 .NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行的应用程序可以通过兼容性开关选择使用此功能。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中辅助功能的新增功能](/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源，其数据包含下拉列表中可能会显示的选项。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source whose data contains the possible selections shown in the drop-down list.

value.span: 一个 或 ，它包含一个值集合，用于向下拉列表提供数据。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to the drop-down list.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，通过 属性为整个单元格列设置此属性。Typically this property is set for an entire column of cells through the property. 如果可能，请将 设置为仅包含可能选择的源，例如选择的列。If possible, set to a source containing only the possible selections, like a column of selections. 则不需要设置 属性。Then the property doesn't need to be set. 但如果源更复杂，请将 设置为要从中检索可能选择的属性或列的名称。But if the source is more complicated, set to the name of the property or column from which to retrieve possible selections. 如果 设置为字符串数组，则不需要设置 和 ，因为数组中的每个字符串都将用于值和显示。If is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 更改 属性会导致单元重新初始化其 集合，并重新绘制自身。Changing the property causes the cell to reinitialize its collection and redraw itself. 当您更改 属性的值时，控件尝试将 和 属性值用于新数据源，并将每个属性设置为 `null` （如果找不到它的值）。When you change the value of the property, the control attempts to use the and property values with the new data source, and sets each property to `null` if its value cannot be found. 在此过程中发生的任何异常都将被忽略，除非它是以下关键异常之一： 、、、、、或 。Any exception that occurs during this process is ignored unless it is one of the following critical exceptions: , , , , , , or . 设置 后， 会附加到数据源的 事件。When the is set, the attaches to the event of the data source. 如果 与 分离，则资源不会立即释放。When the is detached from the , the resource is not immediately released. 当释放附加的数据源时，将释放 资源。The resource is released when the attached data source is disposed. 若要立即释放资源以进行垃圾回收，请将 属性设置为 `null`。To release the resource for garbage collection immediately, set the property to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定要在何处收集将在下拉列表中显示的选项。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather selections to display in the drop-down list.

value.span: 一个字符串，它指定在 属性中指定的数据源中的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值是 ，它指示将不会使用 属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the property will not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示组合框下拉列表中显示的文本信息。 represents the text information displayed in the combo box drop-down list. 与此相反， 属性表示选择的对应值。In contrast, the property represents the corresponding value of a selection. 如果 所显示的所选内容的数据应从 的非默认属性或列中提取，则除了 外，还必须设置 。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 将 设置为字符串数组时，不需要设置 ，因为数组中的每个字符串都将用作有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 加载组合框选择的另一种方法是使用 "" 属性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必须包含从中收集所选内容的属性名称。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定当组合框处于非编辑模式时它的显示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when it is not in edit mode.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单元格未处于编辑模式时，它会影响该单元格的外观，而不管该单元格是否为只读。 The property affects the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode, and regardless of whether it is read-only. 当单元格处于编辑模式时，它将始终如 控件。When the cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果 属性值为 `true`，则 属性只会影响当前单元格。If the property value is `true`, the property affects the cell only when it is the current cell. 下拉箭头的行为和外观由 属性指示。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow is indicated by the property. 若要在鼠标指针位于单元格上时启用单元格突出显示，则必须将 属性设置为 并将 属性值设置为 ""。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over the cell, you must set the property to and the property value to . 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于组合框仅处理文本信息，因此将始终 基础格式化值的类型。Because a combo box only handles text information, the type of the underlying formatted value is always . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定单元格内容的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此示例中， 属性用于在尝试转换值之前确定该单元是否包含 。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 此示例是 事件中提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. span.span: The value of the cell's data after formatting has been applied or if the cell is not part of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将单元格值转换为 属性指示的类型的等效显示值。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件将单元格值传递到 `value` 参数中的此方法。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法首先确定是否满足以下条件之一，`value` 是否有效。This method first determines whether `value` is valid by determining whether one of the following conditions is met. - `value` 出现在 或 集合中。`value` is present in the or the collection. - `value` 是 `null` 或 。`value` is `null` or . - `value` ， 属性值表示 类型。`value` is and the property value represents the type. 如果 `value` 无效，则会发生 事件。If `value` is not valid, the event occurs. 如果此事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序将 属性设置为 `true`，则会引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果 `value` 有效或 事件有处理程序，并且未将 属性设置为 `true`，则会发生 事件。If `value` is valid or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. 事件处理程序可以修改 `value` 和 `cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 但是，如果处理程序未将 属性设置为 `true`，则此方法使用 `cellStyle` 对象的格式设置属性来设置 `value` 格式。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 这可能会导致额外的 事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式设置成功，则此方法将返回在 控件中显示的格式化值。If formatting is successful, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

exception.span: 格式化失败，这是由于 控件的 事件无处理程序或处理程序将 属性设置为 而引起的。

span.span: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the event of the control or the handler set the property to .

exception.span: 出现类型转换错误时，通常可以将异常对象强制转换为类型 ，或者当无法在 或 集合中找到 时，将异常对象强制转换为类型 。

span.span: The exception object can typically be cast to type for type conversion errors or to type if cannot be found in the or the collection.

param.span: 一个 ，确定寄宿控件的外观。

span.span: A that determines the appearance of the hosted control.

summary.span: 附加并初始化寄宿的编辑控件。

span.span: Attaches and initializes the hosted editing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化寄宿 控件，如基本 方法中所述。The method initializes the hosted control as described in the base method. 此外，对于每个调用， 执行以下操作：In addition, for every invocation, does the following: - 设置寄宿 控件的可视属性，如 、和 ，以匹配当前单元格的相应属性。Sets the visual properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 设置寄宿 控件的数据绑定属性，如 、和 ，以匹配当前单元格的相应属性。Sets the data-bound properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 重新初始化宿主 控件的 属性。Reinitializes the property of the hosted control. 此方法还会调整单元格的维度，以容纳承载 控件。This method also adjusts the cell's dimensions to accommodate the hosted control.

summary.span: 获取对象，这些对象表示下拉列表中显示的选项。

span.span: Gets the objects that represent the selection displayed in the drop-down list.

value.span: 包含选项的 。

span.span: An containing the selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可让你获取对当前存储在 中的项列表的引用。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 通过此引用，你可以添加项、移除项以及获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 有关可通过 集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the collection, see . 如果将字符串添加到 ，则不需要设置 和 ，因为添加的每个字符串都将用于值和显示。If strings are added to , then and do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用具有相同显示值的多个项。 does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values. 如果设置了 属性，则不能使用 属性。If the property is set, then the property cannot be used. 单元格的格式化值必须始终是 集合中的值之一，否则将发生错误，并且单元格值将恢复为集合中的第一项。The formatted value of the cell must always be one of the values in the collection or an error will occur and the cell value will revert to the first item in the collection. 您可以通过处理 和 事件来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by handling the and events. 如果将此属性设置为父列 属性的值以外的值，则将强制行成为不共享的，从而分配额外的内存。Setting this property to a value other than the value of the parent column's property will force the row to become unshared, allocating extra memory. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

related.span: 缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

param.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键。

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

summary.span: 确定是否应基于给定键启动编辑模式。

span.span: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.

returns.span: 如果应启动编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件的 属性设置为 或 时，控件将使用此方法来确定在此单元格有焦点的情况下，用户按下的键是否为按下的键。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 此方法返回 `true` 如果 e 参数指示以下键或键组合之一： F4、ALT + 向上键、ALT + 向下键或普通的数据输入键（如字母、数字、标点符号或空格键）未通过 ALT 或 CTRL 进行修改，不包括 SHIFT + SPACE，该控件用于选择。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates one of the following keys or key combinations: F4, ALT+UP ARROW, ALT+DOWN ARROW, or an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的默认键盘和鼠标处理](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

related.span: Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的默认键盘和鼠标处理

span.span: Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对组合框中的项进行了自动排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are automatically sorted.

value.span: 如果对组合框进行了排序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定宿主 是否对现有项进行排序，并将新项添加到列表中的相应排序位置。This property specifies whether the hosted sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 当此属性设置为 `false`时，新项将添加到现有列表的末尾。When this property is set to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 排序操作不区分大小写，按字母顺序按字母顺序执行。The sorting operation is case-insensitive and performed in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

exception.span: 尝试对附加到数据源的单元格进行排序。

span.span: An attempt was made to sort a cell that is attached to a data source.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定要在何处收集下拉列表中使用的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather the underlying values used in the drop-down list.

value.span: 指定属性名称或列名称的字符串。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示会忽略此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示所选内容的相应值。 represents the corresponding value of a selection. 与此相反， 属性表示下拉列表中显示的文本信息。In contrast, the property represents the text information displayed in the drop-down list. 属性为下拉列表中显示的选择值指定数据源。The property specifies the data source for the value of the selections displayed in the drop-down list. 如果 所显示的所选内容的数据应从 的非默认属性或列中提取，则除了 外，还必须设置 。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 将 设置为字符串数组时，不需要设置 ，因为数组中的每个字符串都将用作有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 加载组合框选择的另一种方法是使用 "" 属性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必须包含从中收集所选内容的属性名称。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

span.span: The property is not and the specified value when setting this property is not or and does not name a valid property or column in the data source.
